Transportation.Description: Electric vehicles have the potential to significantly reduce carbon emissions compared to traditional gasoline-powered vehicles.
Public transportation systems, such as buses and trains, can help reduce traffic congestion by providing an alternative to individual car usage.
Using bicycles as a mode of transportation promotes physical activity, leading to improved health and reduced reliance on motor vehicles.
Shipping plays a crucial role in enabling global trade by transporting goods across long distances, supporting economic growth and development.
